text: Ali Hassan Mwinyi (8 May 1925 - 29 February 2024) was a Tanzanian politician. He was the second President of Tanzania from 1985 to 1995. Before that he had been Interior Minister and Vice President. He also was chairman of the ruling party, the Chama Cha Mapinduzi (CCM) from 1990 to 1996. Mwinyi was born in Kivure, in the Pwani Region. He died of lung cancer at a hospital in Dar es Salaam, on 29 February 2024, at the age of 98. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1925 births Category:Presidents of Tanzania Category:2024 deaths Category:Tanzanian lawyers Category:Teachers Category:Deaths from lung cancer
title: Ali Hassan Mwinyi
